org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: sh "curl -Lo snyk https://github.com/snyk/snyk/releases/latest/download/snyk-linux" sh "curl -O -s -L https://github.com/snyk/cli/releases/download/v1.1296.2/snyk-linux.sha256" sh "shasum snyk-linux.sha256" sh "chmod +x snyk" sh "./snyk --version"

sh "curl -Lo hadolint https://github.com/hadolint/hadolint/releases/download/v2.12.0/hadolint-Linux-x86_64" sh "curl -O -s -L https://github.com/hadolint/hadolint/releases/download/v2.12.0/hadolint-Linux-x86_64.sha256" sh "shasum hadolint-Linux-x86_64.sha256" sh "chmod +x hadolint" sh "./hadolint --version"
trivy image --scanners vuln --format table -o image.html aravindh05/devscops_testing_frontend

sh "wget https://github.com/docker/scout-cli/releases/download/v1.17.1/docker-scout_1.17.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz" sh "tar -xvf docker-scout_1.17.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz.1" sh "chmod +x docker-scout" sh "./docker-scout version"
trivy image --vuln-type os --ignore-unfixed -f json --output patch.json aravindh05/devscops_testing_frontend
